description: In Puerto Rico and elsewhere, researchers are attempting to restore coral reefs and make corals more resilient to ocean heat — with some recent success.
title: As coral reefs face unprecedented heat, scientists experiment with new ways to protect them

description: Los Angeles Dodgers designated hitter Shohei Ohtani hit his 50th home run and stole his 50th base of the season on Thursday, becoming the first MLB player to reach both benchmarks in the same season.
title: Dodgers' Shohei Ohtani becomes first player to hit 50 home runs and steal 50 bases in a season

description: NBC News Investigates: Dealing the Dead, Part 2: After NBC News began investigating a medical center in Texas that was making money by dissecting, studying, and exporting hundreds of unclaimed bodies, the university suspended its program. In part two of this series, NBC News' Liz Kreutz looks at how prevalent the practice is, and the ethics of it.
title: NBC News investigates using and selling unclaimed corpses

description: Israeli airstrikes hit Lebanon today following two days of deadly electronic device explosions that targeted Hezbollah, killing 37 and injuring thousands more people. The militia group's leader today is vowing retaliation.NBC News' Keir Simmons reports.
title: Lebanon hit with Israeli airstrikes today following device explosions

description:
A new government report investigates how the world's biggest social media platforms are collecting and using your personal information.
NBC News' Tom Costello reports.
title: Feds warn of 'vast surveillance' of your online data

description: Despite digressions involving cats and a hiccup on abortion policy, Donald Trump has grown close to JD Vance, talking with him almost every day and cheering on his frequent TV appearances.
title: Inside Trump and Vance's 'buddy level' relationship

description: Nintendo and The Pokémon Co. are suing the makers of Palworld, claiming the game infringes on the “Pocket Monster” franchise’s patents.
title: Nintendo and The Pokémon Co. accuse Palworld game developer of patent infringement in new lawsuit

description: A California couple lost their beloved while vacationing at Yellowstone. Two months later, he turned up 800 miles away. KSBW's Zoe Hunt reports.
title: California cat travels 800 miles after being lost at Yellowstone

description: Former CIA director John Brennan joins TODAY to discuss the explosions of pagers and walkie-talkies across Lebanon. He also weighs in on Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's plans to "vanquish" Hamas and Hezbollah. “I wish that he would use more time and effort to try to see whether or not there was a way to bring down some of the tensions as opposed to using the military and violence to lash out against his enemies,” he says.
title: John Brennan warns of escalation after Hezbollah devices explode

description: The U.S. ranks as the worst performer among 10 developed nations in critical areas of health care, according to a startling new report from The Commonwealth Fund.
title: The U.S. health care system is failing, a startling new report finds
